website_summaries.verdict: The best diapers at the lowest price – you get more than twice as many as other leading brands for a similar price.
pros: Features soft material and a Leakguard core to pull wetness from baby's skin
Comes in a pack of 252 and has a money-back guarantee
cons: They are a bit thinner and less absorbent than Pampers, but they are about half the price

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and the best diapers
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite brand of diapers. When my daughter was born we used Several brands before finding these. She had the worst butt rash for so long. Her skin was breaking down. We were using diaper creams, corn starch, baking soda, we were cleaning it, we were drying it after every change, it wasn’t going anywhere. We were at a loss. Finally, I got luvs brand as a gift (we had been trying other brands as well), but these did it! 3 days in luvs and that butt rash cleared right up! She’s so much happier! And for $20-25 for 252 diapers, who can beat that price?!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Nichole Swarnes

customer_reviews.title: Love Luvs!
customer_reviews.text: Love Luvs! Used Pampers, Huggies, Seventh Generation (the WORST!), and these are my favorite! They gel up thick with pee but don’t leak. They’re also the cheapest. Between taking care of my ex’s kids in Luvs and now mine, I could count on my hands how many leakers I’ve had in all the years I’ve used these.
customer_reviews.author: C & O

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper, great price
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these diapers. They hold alot of pee and poo and almost never leak. These are great for daytime and nighttime use. They also cost significantly less than pampers and huggies while doing a better job. The only thing I didn't like at first was not having the wetness indicator but it didn't take me long at all to figure out how to tell if diaper needs changing so it's not a big deal to me to not have it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica F.

customer_reviews.title: STRONGLY SCENTED
customer_reviews.text: Ugh! So disappointed! I was so excited about the unit pricing of luvs but the box arrived and they smell so strongly I can’t stand it. Exchanging immediately. Might be a plus for some parents but I wish the description mentioned the scent. I had no idea. Should have read other reviews!
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Love luvs diapers!
customer_reviews.text: Always love using this brand of diapers since discovering them with my 2nd child. It's cheaper than the other brands (which is a plus for me), has a great smell and holds well throughout the day and night time. Just sad that the new size that my baby fits is much more expensive than the price it used to be. Hopefully the price goes back down the way it was, otherwise its a great brand of diapers!
customer_reviews.author: Fbashar

customer_reviews.title: Very thin, different from normal luvs
customer_reviews.text: I’ve gotten two different types of luvs, they must’ve redid their diapers. The diapers I bought in store/ from the shower were thicker and absorbed better, this giant box is much thinner(you can literally see one poop through the lining of the diaper) these are cheap “name brand” diapers and you get exactly that
customer_reviews.author: Nardi

customer_reviews.title: Not made for #2
customer_reviews.text: I had been using brand name diapers in newborn size, but these Luvs size 1’s were such a good deal I figured I’d give them a try. The first time my son (10 pounds, right in the middle of the weight range for these) pooped in one, it went right out the side! And yes, I’m sure it was applied correctly. We didn’t have this issue with the brand name. So now I have to decide if I want to save money and do laundry constantly or just buy more expensive diapers and move on.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: These diapers work as well as any others, but are cheaper by about 4 cents per diaper than I have been able to get any others, even when others are on sale. Sizing and thickness seem to be right on track with all the other brands. The only thing I don't like about them is they have a very strong baby powder scent as soon as you open the package. It would also be nice if they had the wetness indicator strip, but that is not a deal-breaker for me as I can usually still tell easily.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Should have given them a go sooner!
customer_reviews.text: We couldn’t be happier with this product. Zero leaks or blow outs after one box of diapers. These cost substantially less than the leading competitors. One observation is the lack of extended front tabs. Where it was convenient with the other brands, it isn’t present with these (reference pictures). The lack of tabs hasn’t changed the performance and isn’t deal breaker based on the overall value of these diapers. I wish we would have given these a try much earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Hifi Enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: The worst diapers for us
customer_reviews.text: We had a skinny new born and not one NB size Love’s diaper worked for us. We ended up returning this purchase. Leaks happens but there was no absorbency in this brand. He would go through one out of every eight diapers when it came to other brands. But again, not one Loves diaper would hold. Kept trying as he grew and finished off one brand and no luck. I would have to open another pack from another company. Loves is not for us.
customer_reviews.author: K.R.

customer_reviews.title: OK diapers but not our favorite.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Inexpensive Leak protection is much better than pampers. Cons: They have a weird smell (even when clean). No wetness indicator line. Blue colored diapers make it hard to see pee. Our favorite is tippy toes which are also very cheap but we couldn't get those on Amazon and got these in a pinch. Mom, dad, and grandma all didn't like these diapers but at least they were cheap. They are probably still better than pampers though which have leaked on me 3 times when she peed while breastfeeding.
customer_reviews.author: O. D. Book Reviews

customer_reviews.title: NOT LEAK PROOF!
customer_reviews.text: YOU DO NOT WANT TO SEE PHOTOS TRUST ME!! This is the third blow out I had at night. POO out the sides , up the back, And now all over his sheets yet again. I WILL NEVER BUY THIS BRAND AGAIN!! A Diaper should last between night feedings. Stick to/with- Pampers, Huggies, Kirkland Brands! -Because lUVS Equals, Messy Baby, Messy Sheets. More Laundry, and in our case NOW A DIAPER RASH due to the fact luvs does not pull moister away from the babies bum.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald

customer_reviews.title: No wetness indicator....unless they upgraded......then they are great
customer_reviews.text: I wish these had the wetness indicator. I go with a different brand for my babies under 2 months old for the indicator. These are just as good as more expensive brands for infants. When they get a little older, some diapers with better poosplosion may be good, but these are fine for tiny ones.......if they just had that indicator. They are not as soft as the Pampers, or Huggies Little Snugglers, but they aren't sand paper either like off brands. Great option for parents looking for a happy marriage between budget friendly and quality
customer_reviews.author: Whimsical

customer_reviews.title: Great for frequent changes.
customer_reviews.text: Luvs are my favorite. For the price, they’re exceptional. But I have to buy Huggies for night time and if my baby poops in a Luv’s all bets are off. But overall, during the day they do the job just fine. My toddler is in size 5 luvs and they last all night and never leak. So I think the absorbency of the small diapers is lacking.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Great diapers at great price!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Held up better than huggies for massive loads, only a small leak if any where Huggies was very destructive... My only complaint is that I really like the wet indicator on other diapers and these dont have one but I think they're better than many at lower cost. Also like Pampers Swaddlers but nearly twice as much.
customer_reviews.author: mchere23

customer_reviews.title: Best value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Best value for the price. Any diaper will leak if the parent doesn't know how to properly put it on. Conversely, even the cheapest diaper will do the job for a while when properly put on. And remember if you think that if you think "six to ten pounds" on the side of the diaper box means how much the diaper will hold - you might be a redneck.
customer_reviews.author: WOLFSON

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Item description and blow outs
customer_reviews.text: So, with the price, they are about the cheapest you can get for how many come in the box. BUT with that being said, we have had 3-4 blowouts within the past couple weeks with these diapers. We have never had this many blow outs with other brands. One good thing though, is it absorbs the urine from the kiddo but for some reason, allows him to blow out to his back when he goes #2. **Title shows that it is "ultra luvs" but the photos and description of the item says Tripleguard. I was sent Ultra's twice. Does not have wetness indicator
customer_reviews.author: Sid

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat longtime customer!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve used luvs for the past 3 years with our son and now with our newborn daughter. I honestly can’t say that they will be perfect for your baby because all babies are different when it comes to sensitivity but we’ve never once had any issues. Leaks are never a problem, they definitely hold a lot, and the little line that changes color when wet is a plus! Besides store brand it’s the cheapest for the most product as far as we can find!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: unimpressive
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this brand after trying Pampers, Huggies, Honest and the Berkley Jensen brand and to be honest I am not impressed, I'm somewhat disappointed. These diapers retain pee in the front and look bulky in a short period of time which means you will change them often and go through the box quite quickly, for me the box did not last as long as expected. My biggest issue was the smell, they have a very strong scent, it's so bad that as soon as I opened the first one to put it on my child I smelt it and it gave me a headache. I won't be purchasing these diapers again.
customer_reviews.author: Sheenab

customer_reviews.title: Smart design and a good fit.  A reliable diaper.
customer_reviews.text: We like Luvs and these are nice diapers for the investment. They have all the features all the big name brands tout, usually at the same or better quality for a fair price. They are reliable, though we are diligent to change her frequently, and we use nighttime diapers at night. They keep her dry and comfortable. They are just as good as all of the other major national brands. We haven't ever had any issues with skin rashes or bad reactions.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: to small to be size 1. should be lable for NB.
customer_reviews.text: my son who is 10lb, can barely fit the diaper on. there is 3 packs inside and im just about done with the first pack. good for pee but poop will leak out up the back if the baby is laying on its back. happened a few to many times. i dont like to waste so i will try to use it until i have to switch to different brand or size. diaper is a lot smaller then other brand of same size.
customer_reviews.author: D. Thao

customer_reviews.title: Terribly Made Product
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the worse diapers to purchase. I honestly want a refund. These diapers are not leak proof. They leaked the first night. Then by the third day my 6 week old had a terrible rash from these terribly made diapers. Now I'm out of money and stuck with a bunch of diapers my baby can't and won't be using due to the skin rash it has caused her to have.
customer_reviews.author: UnicornLover

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous when I started using these with my newborn because of the scent but they have been great. It doesn’t mess with my babies skin or give him diaper rash which is all I expected with the smell. The price works well for me with the frequency of changing. As my little one gets older it is clear I’ll be needing something more absorbent for night time. All in all good for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Carrick

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt hold anything!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these diapers because they were a little cheaper and I thought it would be good to try them out, but I've only been disappointed in them. First they have a VERY strong sense. They are also very thin and because if that my baby is often covered in urine if left in her diaper for a few hours. When other brands she can go all night and still be comfortable. Many times I've fed her in the middle of the night and her whole back is wet and also her blankets. I would recommend going for a little more expensive brand and not have to deal with the mess and needing to change her clothes 2x a day.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler a.

customer_reviews.title: Only diapers that don’t leak!
customer_reviews.text: We have tried buggies and pampers and these are the only one my little one doesn’t leak through. I was skeptical because they are much thinner than other diapers but they really work. Only ones I will use!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Does its job, but quality isn't consistent.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. It absorbed well, but the inside absorbent stuff came off on my kid. I'm glad he is a boy or else I would be scared he would have gotten a uti or infection of some sort if he was a girl. I had been gifted another box of luvs and didn't have the same experience. Its hit and miss on the quality if the diapers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaks through at night
customer_reviews.text: The price for these are great. Wish I liked them. I really dont like the way they fit. I would like it the front part wasnt straight and it had a bit to wrap around the sides. Also my 2 month old is pretty good at sleeping through the night and this diaper has leaked through so many times now I've made the decision to switch to another brand.
customer_reviews.author: StephiJ

customer_reviews.title: Good deals, good diapers
customer_reviews.text: While I'm not one to stick to a particular brand when it comes to diapers, especially when there are deals for other brands, these do work well. I have been satisfied with how well Luvs works, especially over some of the other brands like Pampers. Luvs, as a whole, seems to be cheaper than the other brands, which I appreciate. As long as they keep their prices low and their deals coming, I will gladly keep buying these.
customer_reviews.author: CollegeGrad08Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: No No No
customer_reviews.text: Leaked. So flimsy and cheap feeling. Not soft at all.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Gagne

customer_reviews.title: Super thin, very bad quality diaper.
customer_reviews.text: I have never written a review before but this time I have to. Very disappointed with the purchase. First of all, the description and the picture showed there is a wetness indicator but there is none. The diaper is size 1 but measures way less than a new born diaper size ( comparing with huggies, pampers and momma bear ) and it is super thin. There is a weird smell in the diaper. I don't know what to do with this big box. I have just wasted my money in it.
customer_reviews.author: A M

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy, get sams brand
customer_reviews.text: Used luvs for first 5 months because I was told they’re the best budget friendly diapers. So not true!! Sams brand (makers mark) diapers are amazing and less expensive I had to put 2 diapers on my daughter at night with luvs and EVERY TIME she pooped it blew out of the diaper. I thought it was just bc of her poop, but she rarely blows out of the sams diapers now.
customer_reviews.author: Rcoll6895

customer_reviews.title: I love Luvs
customer_reviews.text: I used Luvs with my first daughter, but my second daughter leaked through everything. This third time I decided to try them again, and they are working great. So much cheaper than the rest and they hold up all night. My daughter has slept for 8 hours wearing these and they hold everything, no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Kcox

customer_reviews.title: Heavy chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: We stopped using these after the second day since the chemical smell from the diaper was so strong we have a hard time smelling #1 or #2. Since I am not pumped to put heavy chemicals next to my child’s butt and genitals we now have about 240 extra diapers sitting around. That being said, they did seem to work/fit well, although there was no major poop-explosions (poopsplosions), so I don’t know if we fully tested them. The only other downside is that there is no visual indicator of wetness, whereas other brands have a yellow line that turns blue when wet, these dont.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: No wetness indicator as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they are significantly cheaper than even the Amazon brand diapers. They have good leak protection and last overnight, however the box says there is a wetness indicator and there is not one. I would have bought a different brand if I had known. I do not like to keep a wet diaper on my baby and because she's so little, it's hard to tell if it's wet unless it's full.
customer_reviews.author: SarahB!

customer_reviews.title: Negative to the new design 🙁.
customer_reviews.text: I have been a loyal customer of Luvs through 3 littles for the past 5 years. Just recently, when we received our auto monthly order in the mail with the made over new design, is when I noticed a stinky problem. The new diapers do not keep in any type of loose stools, nor do they hold in over night wets. During the day when they are just wet diapers and you are changing them often (almost as soon as the go) they seem to work fine - but that’s the only time. I will be looking into alternatives, unless they switch back to the former glory days of no pee stripe and extra absorbency.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Overpowering scent
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have read Amazon's recommendations article before I bought these diapers! I was trying to go for a less expensive option (which these very much are). Unfortunately, I get headaches easily from scents, and compared to other popular diaper brands (we used Pampers Swaddlers), these are so unnecessarily perfumed. It is pretty strong, so if you are sensitive to scents (or if you dislike the chemicals making your baby's butt smell like eau de parfum), I would probably stick with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ky

customer_reviews.title: Works MOST of the time
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, it's a diaper. It catches the pee and poop MOST of the time (there has definitely been times where it couldn't hold the massive poops my baby made though, and baby poop is nearly impossible to get the stains out of the clothes)
customer_reviews.author: Amy Ryczak

customer_reviews.title: Good absorption but don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: This has given our baby diaper rash within the first few days of using it. It has a scent to it I didn’t expect :( I’m worried that must be what’s causing this. Won’t buy again for our little guy, but it does offer good leak protection.
customer_reviews.author: Kim A

customer_reviews.title: My wallet “luvs” the money saved
customer_reviews.text: Used the expensive brand with my first kid because I was snobby and thought the expensive brands were better. Got smart with my second and third kid, these are just as good if not better. No rash, holds and absorbs well. No leaks at night.
customer_reviews.author: Tati H

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot of pee.
customer_reviews.text: My son and daughter have both used these diapers. Way better than other brands, and absorb well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if you’re buying for the typical Luvs absorbency
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy if you’re buying for the leak protection and absorbency you typically get from Luvs. These are not the same as Luvs I’ve bought in the past. They’re very thin and the absorbent liner barely goes up the back. I noticed as soon as I opened one but I figured I would try it anyway. My four month old woke up at 1am soggy and almost soaked through after having been changed at 7:30pm before bed. She then woke up at 6am and was completely soaked through and needed a bath and a whole bed change. Don’t buy if you’re used to the regular Luvs because these are not them.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Very absorvent and does not start to come apart as some brands do. However i experienced some leakage during overnight use. Its one of the better fits though and appears seamless under clothes. I bought another brand and it was too bulky and stiff on the baby. Did not have that experince with Luvs.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Get your baby something better
customer_reviews.text: Be kind to your babies, get them something better quality! It’s a great value for the price, but this plastic quality and the fact that they poorly absorb so the baby is laying in the poop.... causes diaper rush and overall discomfort! Absolutely no no no for the night unless you wanna do laundry next day
customer_reviews.author: A K

customer_reviews.title: High Recommendation, Lowest Cost
customer_reviews.text: These feel rougher than all the other brands of diapers we tried, and we tried them all, but that’s the only complaint I have. My daughter doesn’t seem to mind it, and her opinion on the matter matters most. Everything else about these diapers, from the price to the absorbency, is better. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: MoMaLa

customer_reviews.title: Diapers on a budget will do
customer_reviews.text: Not the best diapers but if you are on a budget these are the cheapest and will work. I got them to compare with other brands out there. They fit great on my 6 week old baby. However I did not like that when baby pees it will smell right away. These diapers are very thin so that must be why when baby pees the odor leaks out pretty strong. I am constantly changing him because can’t stand the smell and i’m sure he doesn’t like it either. As far as when he poos it holds it all in very well so no complains with that.
customer_reviews.author: Miss leon

customer_reviews.title: They leak and don't trap moisture
customer_reviews.text: They leak. I was really hoping they would be ok for my new baby but after the break down, we ended up spending more anyways. We had to change her almost every hour or she would be wet. They also did nothing to absorb the pee so her skin wouldn't be effectived. My poor baby got a rash after the first few days... If you've used them before and your baby doesn't mind them, the price is unbeatable. They just didn't work for us and we'll be spending the extra money on another brand in the future
customer_reviews.author: Helena Dandrea

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I buy store brand all the time and this is by far worse than that. They have a gross smell to them before they go on my baby and then the smell is 10x worse when she pees even a little. They leak, and they just aren’t worth buying. I won’t buy again, I would return them if it wasn’t such a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C

customer_reviews.title: They're okay
customer_reviews.text: I would have to say that Luvs diapers have definitely gone down in quality. They are not as good as they were when my son was little. The price is great for how many you get, but I am not a Luvs fan anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Asher

customer_reviews.title: Good price for diapers
customer_reviews.text: I like these diapers for my “older” baby I don’t think they held in breast milk poop, because it’s runnier. We had lots of blow outs with these However they are still a great price and value I just had to do extra laundry to wash out the poo stains
customer_reviews.author: piratemom

customer_reviews.title: Not horrible for the price.
customer_reviews.text: If you change your kid often it's a great value. Wouldn't leave baby through the night in them. But if your broke and need diapers and don't mind a blow out or 2, it's a good value for the cost. Maybe size up one size might help if baby is 9 lbs and up.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Carroll

customer_reviews.title: ... was paying for let me say i got a good deal my baby was born 3 weeks ago i ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this while pregnant i had tried the brand previously with my daughters soo i now what i was paying for let me say i got a good deal my baby was born 3 weeks ago i bearly started using these a couple days ago i love the quality and how its not to expensive i love pampers and for me i feel like these are close to those...i like how their not thick like huggies those look like they would be uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for buck, hands down!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a first time mom with no experience with newborns. This box is HUGE, yet everyone says its the best value on the market. I can see. I hope my son can fit these long enough for me to use them. 😂😂😂😂
customer_reviews.author: Chantelle Harris

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper is not always better
customer_reviews.text: My poor baby is always leaking with these. They aren’t very stretchy And now she’s getting a rash on her hip that I noticed today hidden in her lil leg role. They also have a weird smell to them, it’s like a chemical smell but it’s not the same as the others idk... I’m going back to seventh generation!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandrea

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper
customer_reviews.text: This is a diaper that smells like baby powder to block poop or pee smell its kinda strong thats what i needed if u dont heads up its strong smell.i love it my #1 diaper amazing for night time love the monkey design. I try to changee my baby on first pee but when he gets colics tho i let him sleep as long as he needs,there was a time he (newborn) peed 3 times and by the time i changed the diaper amazingly there was no leaks on the crib. Great diaper
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for your buck I haven't had any leaks until he grew bigger obviously good amount of diapers in the box he grew too quick and I have so many leftover lol But always good to donate what you don't use 😉
customer_reviews.author: Danielle fortugno

customer_reviews.title: Blowout City
customer_reviews.text: My daughter literally blew these diapers out daily if not multiple times per day. Also, an overwhelming baby powder smell. Spend a little more money if you can and go with Pampers, otherwise get ready for poop on clothes and anything the baby touches.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Boy do they leak
customer_reviews.text: First of all the perfume on these is horrible. Next. If my baby poops I have to change her daiperand her clothes. I'm very disappointed in these diapers. They are definitely not worth it in my books. It's back to Huggies and up n up for me
customer_reviews.author: Pauline Muhoho

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love these diapers so much! My baby never leaks through them and they hold a lot! They also have a nice baby powder smell. The only issue is that the company is impossible to get ahold of.
customer_reviews.author: Ally McCollister

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but not the best protection
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a diaper cake I made for a family member it worked well but when the baby actually came he peed right through them with the littlest amount of pee
customer_reviews.author: Carlie H.

customer_reviews.title: The Lack Of anLine is a Dealbreaker for This New Mom
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like that these don’t have the strip that turns color when wet. These are more affordable and just as good at preventing leaks and keeping my son comfortable but I won’t buy again because that strip keeps me from guessing and feeling to determine if the diaper needs changing.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Much cheaper than other diaper brands, and gets the job done! Arrived perfectly fine. We would get more diaper “blowouts” with Huggies swaddlers than these kind. He is a year old and still wears Luvs, a size 5 now.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: They’re one of the most affordable diaper brands and they fit our babies well. Big enough and we don’t have trouble with lots of leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel O.

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, causes leakage
customer_reviews.text: Luvs runs very small compared to other brands I've tried which causes leaks. They are very absorbent when you have the correct size. Buy a size up. I'll stick to costco diapers for now they are true to size and very absorbent as well.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Best diapers!
customer_reviews.text: These are my absolute favorite diapers. They are cheaper than Huggies and Pampers AND work way better in my opinion. Right now I've got two in diapers and I love having them delivered to home. So much easier than trying to fit into a cart with two babies!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Midyette

customer_reviews.title: Good for wet diapers,, NOT for poop
customer_reviews.text: This review is for size 1 diapers. We have a little girl and these are fairly decent holding pee. Baby poo on the other hand...... Price is decent, so you get what you pay for. We're having to guess when her next poop is so that we don't use these diapers. Once we finish these diapers, we won't be buying any more. (Sam's Club diapers are better than these)
customer_reviews.author: Homer G.

customer_reviews.title: Did not like the fragrance
customer_reviews.text: Diapers worked fine and were less bulky than other brands but I hated the heavy perfume smell. It was awful and I couldn't wait to finish this box. Not buying again.
customer_reviews.author: BuysStuff

customer_reviews.title: Great experience with Luvs
customer_reviews.text: Used Luvs with my children and had great results so buying them for my grandchildren. Better results than more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: tnChick & NarcoJoe

customer_reviews.title: Low price, good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I tried so many diapers for my limited one! Loves seem to be the best & the most affordable! And they get delivered to your door via Amazon- can’t beat this!
customer_reviews.author: Dasha

customer_reviews.title: Description misleads
customer_reviews.text: Based on the picture and description I thought I'll be getting the newer version with the wetness indicator and two print designs but got the old stock. I guess Amazon wants to get rid of old stock. But here I wanted to try the newer version.
customer_reviews.author: daily shopper

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Read reviews the new design literally blows. Never had any blowouts with daughter and have had 2 in the first 2 days using luvs. They are much thinner than when we used them with our son and the padding stops halfway in diaper which is really strange so hopefully your kid pees and poops in 1 spot. Very disappointed in new quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits good, smells good.
customer_reviews.text: Scented and smells nice. Only when our baby does a bigger load does it smell but there's no real issues there. I only wish they had an indicator but if you get experienced, you really only need to feel the diaper and know. Fits our baby great though! Comfy and snug!
customer_reviews.author: jp

customer_reviews.title: Best diaper ever!
customer_reviews.text: Favorite diaper- you can’t smell poo as easy which is a good and bad thing. Good for obvious reasons, bad because we may not know when the little one poos
customer_reviews.author: NICHOLAS BARRIENTOS

customer_reviews.title: Give baby dipper rash
customer_reviews.text: if possible I will give it zero star. terrible dipper ever ! Poor quality. Baby get rash after only one day’s use. I will never use this again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: I swear by Luvs. Mother of three and I’m always looking to save but make sure the products I use are still great quality. I’ve used from Newborn to size 5. This big box was perfect for my size one stage for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Lyss

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: For day time changes it's ok. It's not very soft or absorbent. There's some leakage for night changes. For the price and amount of diapers it's decent. It lasts about a month. Ok cheap diapers and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We love these diapers. They hold all night we haven't had any issues so far. My daughter seems to like them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Ross

customer_reviews.title: This was a wonderful price for this whole case of diapers
customer_reviews.text: This was a wonderful price for this whole case of diapers. I bought this for someone for a baby shower gift. I am very pleased with the size of the box and Luvs have been around forever! I used to buy Luvs in the 80s when my girls where babies. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally
customer_reviews.text: Finally found diapers that my son doesn't leak through! He's been leaking through diapers since he was a newborn. We finally found these and he can go for hours without leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Leak protection guarantee is far from true.
customer_reviews.text: Well I think that my stars state the obvious. Bought this for the value and tried them with my newborn daughter. Every single diaper leaked through, whether it was liquid or solidish. Every. Single. Time. I do not recommend this brand at all
customer_reviews.author: Adam Wickert

customer_reviews.title: Luvs Never Disappoints Me
customer_reviews.text: I used Luvs for my 4 year old and now for my 4 month old. These diapers have gotten better since my son was little and I love the quality of them. We do not have leaks at all with my daughter and I am SO glad. I will forever be a fan of Luvs diapers. The price is also AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: Destiny S.

customer_reviews.title: No wetness indicator
customer_reviews.text: Over all I love Luvs diapers & I got excited when they started using the color changing wetness indicator, it's easier to notice in the1/2 asleep night feeds. However that is not the product I received, there's a different pattern & no wetness indicator which is why I ordered them online instead of getting them from the store
customer_reviews.author: V Fleig

customer_reviews.title: No wetness indicator
customer_reviews.text: The description said the diapers had a wetness indicator, like the newer luvs diapers, but the box I received had no wetness indicator and are the old monkey luvs diapers. I like that luvs are half the price of other brands, this just felt like false advertising to me. Also the indicator seems more important for a newborn, which is what I have.
customer_reviews.author: catherine c davis

customer_reviews.title: just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Just what our grandson needed during this difficult time. We didn't want mom or dad to get out to buy diapers while taking care of a newborn durring this pandemic. Thank you luvs and amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Eggleston

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for money and works without having any issues
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 big boxes of these diapers. We follow as per diaper wear rules(like folding both edges as marked), so we do not see leaks. Depending on baby's 1 or 2 passing, we have to use the diapers. Initially we did not fold properly, so we were see leaking. So after folding properly and change diapers every 3 to 4 hours once, no leakage issues as of now with diapers.
customer_reviews.author: Narasimha Rao Konaiah

customer_reviews.title: Decent diaper
customer_reviews.text: We bought 4 or more of these boxes, lost count haha. However every box has been perfect. The diapers hold a lot. Only found a little leakage around the legs when our son goes number 2 but still a decent diaper for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dawson

customer_reviews.title: the baby likes them
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a baby shower and I think the baby liked them. Well, I know the parents appreciated them!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Smells better when soiled
customer_reviews.text: Smells like it was marinated in a grandmother's perfume...no thanks! I admit that I might be being a bit picky with this, the one diaper we tried fit and did not leak. However I just could not stand the smell. I think I would prefer the odor if it was soiled...
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Salmans

customer_reviews.title: Solved the poopy leakage!
customer_reviews.text: If you find that size 1 diapers are a bit too large while NB are too small, Luvs may be what your solution is. My granddaughter kept having poop explosions that leaked out of the diaper but after my daughter used Luvs, no more leaking. I suppose they are slightly smaller than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: No leaks, but smells powdery.
customer_reviews.text: I disliked the baby powder scent at first but these work just as well and fit my baby better than any of the more expensive brands. Now I’m used to the scent and it Doesn’t bother me or baby. Will buy over and over. Best value diaper for us.
customer_reviews.author: jessiegirl

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy, terrible quality.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. I’ve used Luvs in the past and thought they were great. This product is absolutely terrible, doesn’t hold very much and leaks very quickly. I learned my lesson after having to change linens daily.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I've used Luvs on my 3 previous children with no issues so I'm stocking up again for baby #4. They don't leak, for my babies great, and you get great value for a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: absorbent. Cheap quality. Had some nasty blowouts with poop up the back all over the clothes. Would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Jona

customer_reviews.title: Great quality,  great price!
customer_reviews.text: I have used luvs with all 4 of my kiddos, they smell like powder so when they pee, baby doesn't just smell like pee. My kids also have sensitive skin, huggies gave a couple of them rashes. Not luvs though, and the price is awesome! My favorite brand! There are other diapers I have used and they are awesome also but the prices can get up there, luvs is just as great and you can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing product
customer_reviews.text: They were purchased for my granddaughter but my daughter in law stated that they are to thin and was very disappointed. I won't be purchasing anymore of these.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Clem

customer_reviews.title: Cheap diapers, soaks through very easily.
customer_reviews.text: Leaks after 2-3 hours. Insides are constantly spilling out after getting wet. Cheap diapers - tabs break off frequently too
customer_reviews.author: J Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Great value just make sure you increase size if there is leaking
customer_reviews.text: I had issue with leaking at night. Urine would leak out the side of diaper, which ever side mybson woukd be laying on but I found that once I increased his diaper size no more issue. Also despite these diapers not having the wet indicator line it is still easy to tell.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFanatic

customer_reviews.title: Luvs are best for avoiding leaks!
customer_reviews.text: Love Luvs! At first I thought they felt cheap compared Huggies or Pampers but don't let appearance fool you they hold up to baby messes! Only time we've had an issue leaking is when baby had an explosive diaper in which it's completely filled. Would highly recommend over Huggies which we had multiple issues leaking with just pee and switched back to these Luvs.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: No wetness indicator as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: A little bothered because these dont have the wetness indicator as advertised. So if you're buying these for that specific purpose, pass and go get swaddlers. Other than that they're plain ol luvs which I've always been a fan of.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for my little one.
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Fit my daughter perfectly. Contours to get wiggly self. Most of all... No leaks. Keeps the wetness away from her skin. Only thing I would change is the tabs can be a little sharp. Just pay attention when putting the diapers on and you shouldn't have any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst batch of diapers I have ever bought. It’s like sand is inside the diaper, so much so that when you shake it, it makes a sound like it’s sand. As soon as the baby pees, the the diaper gets very big and cannot hold a lot of pee. When my son had a lot of pee at a time, the diaper would just break and leak as soon and I held him. Definitely not an all night diaper either. I am very disappointed. I’ve never had trouble with Luvs until now.
customer_reviews.author: Pastor John

product_meta.title: Diapers Newborn/Size 1 (8-14 lb), 252 Count - Luvs Ultra Leakguards Disposable Baby Diapers, ONE MONTH SUPPLY
product_meta.description: Size:Size 1 (252 Count)Stop leaks around the clock with Luvs. Designed with Triple Leakguards , Luvs can absorb 20x its weight and feature a Wetness Indicator that turns blue when wet. When it comes to bedtime, Luvs Nightlock Technology works to lock away wetness so your baby can dream on. For complete comfort, Luvs diapers are super soft on your baby’s skin with a comfy feel, plus they’re designed with larger, refastenable tabs for a secure fit. So try ’em and luv ’em, and if you don’t, Luvs offers a money-back guarantee. Based on weight of absorbent gel. If you’re not completely satisfied, please send the original receipt and UPC to us within 45 days of purchase for a full product refund via prepaid card. Limited to one redemption per household or name.
feature_bullets: Weight Recommendation: 8 to 14 Pounds. Nightlock Technology locks away wetness for upto 12 hours of overnight protection
Super soft on baby's skin for a comfy feel
Wetness Indicator (packaging may vary) turns blue when wet, telling you when your baby needs a change
Designed with larger, refastenable tabs for a secure, snug fit
NOTE: The expiration date is for REWARDS not for the product

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
